name: Kickscraper
author: Shakil Ahamed

sections.description:
It integrates with WordPress, allowing you to update your kick_key (API Key) from the admin dashboard. Enhance scraper protection by adding the Kickscraper script to your site’s tag. Download, activate, and configure your API key for secure data scraping.

Features

  • Simple and lightweight plugin.
  • Adds the Kickscraper script to the <head> tag of your site.
  • Allows dynamic updating of the kick_key (API Key) from the admin dashboard.

Configuration

After activation, follow these steps to configure the plugin:

  1. Navigate to Settings > Kickscraper Key in your WordPress admin panel.
  2. Enter your Kickscraper API Key in the provided field.
  3. Click Save Changes to update your settings.

The Kickscraper script will now be automatically added to the head of your WordPress site using the specified API key.

Usage

Once configured, the plugin works automatically. You can update the API key at any time by revisiting the plugin settings page.

Support

For support, please visit our site for assistance.

Suggestions

If you have suggestions for a new feature or improvement, feel free to contact us at Kickscraper.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPL-2.0+ license. See the LICENSE file for more details.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin files and extract them to your computer.
  2. Upload the kickscraper folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory on your WordPress site.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Go to Settings > Kickscraper Key to configure your Kickscraper API key.
